name: Premium Inca Trail 5 Days
description: Hiking the Inca Trail 5 days is an ideal Trek for visitors with a little bit more of time. On this hike, you can take in beautiful landscapes, exotic valleys, flora and fauna and archeological centers, all with one of our professional guides. And of course, you will have the unforgettable experience of walking through the sun gate and down to one of the wonders of the world, MACHUPICCHU.
